pkgmetadata.longdescription: Elimination-by-Aspects Models // Fitting and testing multi- attribute probabilistic choice models, especially the Bradley- Terry-Luce (BTL) model (Bradley Terry, 1952 doi:10.1093/biomet/39.3-4.324; Luce, 1959), elimination-by- aspects (EBA) models (Tversky, 1972 doi:10.1037/h0032955), and preference tree (Pretree) models (Tversky Sattath, 1979 doi:10.1037/0033-295X.86.6.542).
